contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "every" here is an exaggeration for "many." Alternate translation: "where the streets come together" or "by the roads" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hyperbole]])
contextId.glQuote: at the corner of every street

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "all" is a generalization, meaning "most." Alternate translation: "a laughingstock to most of my people" or "someone whom all my people mock" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hyperbole]])
contextId.glQuote: a laughingstock to all my people
